Package fr.tp.inf112.projects.canvas.model

package fr.tp.inf112.projects.canvas.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.tp.inf112.projects.canvas.model.impl
     
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    Canvas
    Represents the canvas of canvas viewer user interface into which 2D figures will be displayed.
    CanvasChooser
    Represents an object used to chose a canvas model from the data store.
    CanvasPersistenceManager
    Interface providing methods to manage the persistence of canvas models into a data store such as files, databases or any other permanent storage.
    Color
    Specifies the color of an element to be drawn in the user interface.
    Figure
    Represents a figure to be displayed in the canvas of the canvas viewer user interface .
    OvalShape
    Represents an oval shape with given width and height.
    Point
     
    PolygonShape
    Represents a polygon shape having a given set of points.
    RectangleShape
    Represents a rectangle shape of given width and height.
    Shape
    Represents the shape of elements to be displayed in a canvas viewer.
    Stroke
    Represent the stroke properties of elements to be displayed in a canvas viewer.
    Style
    Represents a style, consisting of a background color and stroke properties.
